item.title: [Resolved] OCF website downtime
item.description: Update - This incident has been resolved. (15:18 — Feb 15) another test Update - The OCF website is now completely down as we attempt to redploy a fixed version. (15:14 — Feb 15) Investigating - We are seeing server errors for ocfweb access. (14:55 — Feb 15)
item.content:
Update - This incident has been resolved. (15:18 — Feb 15)

another test

Update - The OCF website is now completely down as we attempt to redploy a fixed version. (15:14 — Feb 15)

Investigating - We are seeing server errors for ocfweb access. (14:55 — Feb 15)
